actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to increase the amount of the deductions allowed for personal exemptions.

summary.text: Amends the Internal Revenue Code to increase the amount of the deductions allowed for personal exemptions from $1,000 to $2,600.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to increase the amount of the deductions allowed for personal exemptions.
